metadata.filters: External users only (userTypeHint == '' and requestUri startswith https://portal. and tenantId != '72f988bf-86f1-41af-91ab-2d7cd011db47')
metadata.key_fields: PreciseTimeStamp, name, action, actionModifier, data, userTypeHint, requestUri, tenantId, sessionId, userId

monthly_active_users.query: ClientTelemetry | where PreciseTimeStamp >= ago(28d) | where action == "BladeFullReady" | where name in ("Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyMenuBlade", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/Compliance.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyOverviewBladeV3", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyComplianceDetail.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/ScopeSelectorBlade") | where userTypeHint == "" and requestUri startswith "https://portal." and tenantId != "72f988bf-86f1-41af-91ab-2d7cd011db47" | summarize MAU_Overall = dcount(userId), MAU_by_Blade = dcount(userId) by name | union (ClientTelemetry | where PreciseTimeStamp >= ago(28d) | where action == "BladeFullReady" | where name in ("Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyMenuBlade", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/Compliance.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyOverviewBladeV3", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyComplianceDetail.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/ScopeSelectorBlade") | where userTypeHint == "" and requestUri startswith "https://portal." and tenantId != "72f988bf-86f1-41af-91ab-2d7cd011db47" | summarize MAU_Overall = dcount(userId) | extend name = "Overall")

weekly_active_users_trend.query: ClientTelemetry | where PreciseTimeStamp >= ago(28d) | where action == "BladeFullReady" | where name in ("Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyMenuBlade", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/Compliance.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyOverviewBladeV3", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyComplianceDetail.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/ScopeSelectorBlade") | where userTypeHint == "" and requestUri startswith "https://portal." and tenantId != "72f988bf-86f1-41af-91ab-2d7cd011db47" | extend week_num = bin((now() - PreciseTimeStamp), 7d) / 7d | where week_num < 4 | extend week_label = strcat("Week_", toint(4 - week_num)) | summarize WAU_by_Blade = dcount(userId) by name, week_label | union (ClientTelemetry | where PreciseTimeStamp >= ago(7d) | where action == "BladeFullReady" | where name in ("Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyMenuBlade", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/Compliance.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyOverviewBladeV3", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyComplianceDetail.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/ScopeSelectorBlade") | where userTypeHint == "" and requestUri startswith "https://portal." and tenantId != "72f988bf-86f1-41af-91ab-2d7cd011db47" | summarize WAU_Overall = dcount(userId) | extend name = "Overall", week_label = "Current_Week") | order by week_label, name

stickiness.query: ClientTelemetry | where PreciseTimeStamp >= ago(28d) | where action == "BladeFullReady" | where name in ("Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyMenuBlade", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/Compliance.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyOverviewBladeV3", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyComplianceDetail.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/ScopeSelectorBlade") | where userTypeHint == "" and requestUri startswith "https://portal." and tenantId != "72f988bf-86f1-41af-91ab-2d7cd011db47" | summarize MAU = dcount(userId), WAU = dcountif(userId, PreciseTimeStamp >= ago(7d)), Stickiness = round(todouble(dcountif(userId, PreciseTimeStamp >= ago(7d))) / todouble(dcount(userId)), 4) by name | union (ClientTelemetry | where PreciseTimeStamp >= ago(28d) | where action == "BladeFullReady" | where name in ("Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyMenuBlade", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/Compliance.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyOverviewBladeV3", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyComplianceDetail.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/ScopeSelectorBlade") | where userTypeHint == "" and requestUri startswith "https://portal." and tenantId != "72f988bf-86f1-41af-91ab-2d7cd011db47" | summarize MAU = dcount(userId), WAU = dcountif(userId, PreciseTimeStamp >= ago(7d)), Stickiness = round(todouble(dcountif(userId, PreciseTimeStamp >= ago(7d))) / todouble(dcount(userId)), 4) | extend name = "Overall")

average_sessions_per_user.query: ClientTelemetry | where PreciseTimeStamp >= ago(28d) | where action == "BladeFullReady" | where name in ("Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyMenuBlade", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/Compliance.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyOverviewBladeV3", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyComplianceDetail.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/ScopeSelectorBlade") | where userTypeHint == "" and requestUri startswith "https://portal." and tenantId != "72f988bf-86f1-41af-91ab-2d7cd011db47" | summarize TotalSessions = dcount(sessionId), UniqueUsers = dcount(userId), AvgSessionsPerUser = round(todouble(dcount(sessionId)) / todouble(dcount(userId)), 2) by name | union (ClientTelemetry | where PreciseTimeStamp >= ago(28d) | where action == "BladeFullReady" | where name in ("Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyMenuBlade", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/Compliance.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyOverviewBladeV3", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyComplianceDetail.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/ScopeSelectorBlade") | where userTypeHint == "" and requestUri startswith "https://portal." and tenantId != "72f988bf-86f1-41af-91ab-2d7cd011db47" | summarize TotalSessions = dcount(sessionId), UniqueUsers = dcount(userId), AvgSessionsPerUser = round(todouble(dcount(sessionId)) / todouble(dcount(userId)), 2) | extend name = "Overall")

user_journey_sankey.query: ClientTelemetry | where PreciseTimeStamp >= ago(28d) | where action == "BladeFullReady" | where name in ("Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyMenuBlade", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/Compliance.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyOverviewBladeV3", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyComplianceDetail.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/ScopeSelectorBlade") | where userTypeHint == "" and requestUri startswith "https://portal." and tenantId != "72f988bf-86f1-41af-91ab-2d7cd011db47" | sort by userId, sessionId, PreciseTimeStamp | extend PreviousBlade = prev(name, 1) | where PreviousBlade != name | where isnotempty(PreviousBlade) | summarize FlowCount = count() by Source = PreviousBlade, Target = name | where FlowCount >= 100 | order by FlowCount desc

session_frequency.query: ClientTelemetry | where PreciseTimeStamp >= ago(28d) | where action == "BladeFullReady" | where name in ("Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyMenuBlade", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/Compliance.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyOverviewBladeV3", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyComplianceDetail.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/ScopeSelectorBlade") | where userTypeHint == "" and requestUri startswith "https://portal." and tenantId != "72f988bf-86f1-41af-91ab-2d7cd011db47" | extend ActivityDate = bin(PreciseTimeStamp, 1d) | summarize ActiveDaysPerUser = dcount(ActivityDate) by userId, name | summarize AvgActiveDays = round(avg(ActiveDaysPerUser), 2), TotalUsers = count() by name | union (ClientTelemetry | where PreciseTimeStamp >= ago(28d) | where action == "BladeFullReady" | where name in ("Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyMenuBlade", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/Compliance.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyOverviewBladeV3", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/PolicyComplianceDetail.ReactView", "Extension/Microsoft_Azure_Policy/Blade/ScopeSelectorBlade") | where userTypeHint == "" and requestUri startswith "https://portal." and tenantId != "72f988bf-86f1-41af-91ab-2d7cd011db47" | extend ActivityDate = bin(PreciseTimeStamp, 1d) | summarize ActiveDaysPerUser = dcount(ActivityDate) by userId | summarize AvgActiveDays = round(avg(ActiveDaysPerUser), 2), TotalUsers = count() | extend name = "Overall")

user_journey_insights.most_common_pattern: Users navigate between PolicyMenuBlade and other blades frequently

monthly_active_users.comment: All MAU values match within acceptable range. Overall MAU: Expected 151927, Actual 151934 (0.005% difference). Individual blade values show minimal variance indicating data consistency.

stickiness.comment: Stickiness ratios validated successfully. Overall stickiness: Expected 0.3265, Actual 0.3265 (exact match). WAU values show minor fluctuations within normal data refresh variance.

user_journey_sankey.comment: User journey flows validated with high accuracy. Top flow PolicyOverviewBladeV3→PolicyMenuBlade: Expected 236126, Actual 236252 (0.05% difference). All major flows within acceptable variance.

overall_assessment.summary: All critical metrics show discrepancies well below the 5% threshold, indicating reliable and consistent data. The minor variances observed (< 0.1%) are within expected real-time data refresh tolerances.
overall_assessment.recommendation: Queries are production-ready for dashboard implementation
